Keywords: Codex , Cosmic , Deity , Maximum Carnage , Monster
Real Name: Knull
Special Powers
THE FIRST SYMBIOTE, MY SHADOW: Knull may start the game with [SVC] #s005 All-Black the Necrosword equipped (at not cost).
THE GOD OF SYMBIOTES: Plasticity. Shape Change, but succeeds on a 4-6. // When Knull KO's an opposing character, after resolutions heal 2 clicks.
UMBRAKINESIS: Stealth. Smoke Cloud as FREE. // FREE: Place Knull in a square of hindering terrain within 4 squares.
Figure Errata
Changed THE GOD OF SYMBIOTES and UMBRAKINESIS
Post Comment
Comments
June 22, 2022
Redrover454
Now that he's errata'd, it's a real shame that I never gave this guy a chance. Basically his only weakness is getting EW'd and failing his 50/50 Shape. He is fantastic for hit and runs, or just tying people up with Plasticity and forcing them to punch his Shape Change, hopefully while also having - 1 to attack from his FREE Smoke. Between All-Black, Outwit, FREE placement, and flight, trying to spare figs from Knull's wrath seems pretty futile. Keep your opponent's EW/BCF away from Knull and I'm sure he'll win you some matches.
July 13, 2021
nlegore
ERRATA: THE GOD OF SYMBIOTES: Plasticity. Shape Change, but succeeds on a 4-6. // When Knull KO's an opposing character, after resolutions heal 2 clicks. UMBRAKINESIS: Stealth. Smoke Cloud as FREE. // FREE: Place Knull in a square of hindering terrain within 4 squares.
October 1, 2020
RockyRaccoon
I prefer this click more because you potentially have two roll-outs to avoid damage from an attack. Not to mention the fact that you’re getting an insanely good brawler for 125 points who can end up being very, very hard to kill. I could see him being very annoying for a monster theme team with the uncommon Proteus from X-Men the Dark Phoenix Saga set. He’s very nasty overall. Just make it as annoying as possible to hurt you in any way.
